revised_title: Observations of a New Variable Star: ~ Lyrae
tldr: The author, John Goodricke, discovers a new variable star, ~ Lyrae, and observes its periodical variation in brightness over time. The star undergoes changes in brightness every 12 days and 19 hours, with the author suggesting that the extent of its variation may be inaccurately ascertained due to the nature of such estimations.
